1.4. Variables¶

global.var.confettiConfig¶

dom-confetti configuration.

Type

Object

Value
{
  angle: 0,
  spread: 90,
  startVelocity: 20,
  elementCount: 20,
  width: "10px",
  height: "10px",
  perspective: "200px",
  colors: ["#a864fd", "#29cdff", "#78ff44", "#ff718d", "#fdff6a"],
  duration: 2000,
  stagger: 3,
  dragFriction: 0.12,
  random: Math.random
}
